thread.title: Rajinikanth's Kabali team granted permission
thread.title_full: Rajinikanth's Kabali team granted permission - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rajinikanth's Kabali team granted permission
text:
Rajinikanth's Kabali team is gearing up for their next schedule in Malaysia. The Malaysian Tourism Department had granted permission to the Kabali team to shoot in the State of Melaka. Produced by Kalaipuli S Thanu, the movie also stars Kalaiarasan, Dinesh, Radhika Apte and Dhansika in the lead roles. After the Malaysian schedule, the film is said to have schedules in Hong Kong and Thailand as well.
Directed by Pa. Ranjith, the film chronicles the story of a don, played by Rajinikanth. Santhosh Naraynan will be scoring music for this film. Expectations for the movie have been skyrocketing ever since the first look poster of the superstar was revealed.
